description:
Tsumugi gets into a fight at daycare, and it spoils her mood for good cooking.  Even the long-awaited Hamburg steak isn`t enough to rouse her from her gloom.  Can Kotori and Kouhei come up with a way to cheer her up so she can enjoy her meal? 
And will she find out how much her daddy really loves her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsumugi and the Long-Awaited Hamburg Steak
Tsumugi et les steaks Salisbury tant attendus
つむぎとおまたせのハンバーグ
